Name: Valencia Cocktail No. 2
Ingredients: 45 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
4 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura optional
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.
Review: Aromatic and fruity - makes Bucks Fizz look a tad sad.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Valencia Cocktail No. 2 contains 139 calories
